title: Why doesnt my sim card register on my pixel 3 although it still works on iPhone?
content:
I have contacted google support and it was a waste of time they ended up pointing fingers at Verizons sim card  but Verizon supplied a new sim card and it still showed no sim card when incerted. This problem occurred after a 280 USD screen replacement by "youbreakit Ifixit" that  was ceritfed and priced by Google
.
